name: @antonycc/the-quiet-feed
description: The Quiet Feed - Your feeds, stripped of the garbage
author: Antony Cartwright <antony@polycode.co.uk>

scripts.build: ./mvnw clean verify && git restore web/public/submit.deployment-name.txt web/public/submit.environment-name.txt || true
scripts.formatting-fix: prettier --write . && ./mvnw spotless:apply && git restore web/public/submit.deployment-name.txt web/public/submit.environment-name.txt || true
scripts.formatting:js-fix: prettier --write . && git restore web/public/submit.deployment-name.txt web/public/submit.environment-name.txt || true
scripts.formatting:java-fix: ./mvnw -DskipTests spotless:apply && git restore web/public/submit.deployment-name.txt web/public/submit.environment-name.txt || true
scripts.linting-fix: eslint --fix . && git restore web/public/submit.deployment-name.txt web/public/submit.environment-name.txt || true
scripts.cdk:synth-environment: cd cdk-environment && npx dotenv -e ../.env -- npx dotenv -e ../.env.${ENVIRONMENT_NAME:-prod} -- npx cdk synth --require-approval never --ci true --strict --validation && cd ..
scripts.cdk:synth-application: cd cdk-application && npx dotenv -e ../.env -- npx dotenv -e ../.env.${ENVIRONMENT_NAME:-prod} -- npx cdk synth --require-approval never --ci true --strict --validation && cd ..
scripts.cdk: ./mvnw clean verify -DskipTests && ENVIRONMENT_NAME=prod npm run cdk:synth-environment && ENVIRONMENT_NAME=prod npm run cdk:synth-application && ENVIRONMENT_NAME=prod && git restore web/public/submit.deployment-name.txt web/public/submit.environment-name.txt || true && npm run clean && ./mvnw clean compile -DskipTests
scripts.cdk-ci: ./mvnw clean verify -DskipTests && ENVIRONMENT_NAME=ci   npm run cdk:synth-environment && ENVIRONMENT_NAME=ci   npm run cdk:synth-application && ENVIRONMENT_NAME=ci   && git restore web/public/submit.deployment-name.txt web/public/submit.environment-name.txt || true && npm run clean && ./mvnw clean compile -DskipTests
scripts.everything: time sh -c 'rm -rf package-lock.json node_modules target && ./mvnw clean && npm install && npm test && npm run docker:build && ./mvnw test && npm run test:all && npm run test:allBehaviour-proxy && npm run build && npm run cdk-ci && npm run cdk && git restore web/public/submit.deployment-name.txt web/public/submit.environment-name.txt || true && ./mvnw clean compile && npm ci && npm test'
scripts.test:all: npx vitest --run app/unit-tests/*.test.js app/unit-tests/*/*.test.js app/system-tests/*.test.js web/unit-tests/*.test.js && npm run test:browser && npm run test:behaviour-proxy && git restore web/public/submit.deployment-name.txt web/public/submit.environment-name.txt || true
scripts.test:authBehaviour-proxy-record: TEST_WIREMOCK=record npx dotenv -e .env.proxy -- npm run test:authBehaviour
scripts.test:authBehaviour-proxy-mock: TEST_WIREMOCK=mock npx dotenv -e .env.proxy -- npm run test:authBehaviour
scripts.auth: npx dotenv -e .env.proxy -- docker run -p 8080:8080 -e JSON_CONFIG_PATH=/config/mock-oauth2-config.json -e LOG_LEVEL=DEBUG -v $(pwd)/mock-oauth2-config.json:/config/mock-oauth2-config.json:ro ghcr.io/navikt/mock-oauth2-server:3.0.1
